hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever helps to kill a believer, even with half a world, he will meet Allah (SWT) with (the words) written between his eyes, 'He has no hope of the mercy of Allah (SWT).”

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي قَتْلِ مُسْلِمٍ ظُلْمًا
chapter.eng-name: The Severity Of Killing A Muslim
